name: Brute Force
description:
Brute Force is an action-shooter game developed by Digital Anvil. It was originally released in 2003. Microsoft Game Studios published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Brute Force is available on Xbox.
Chris Parker and Chris Roberts produced the game. Chris Parker and Chris Roberts directed the game. It was scored by James Hannigan and Jesper Kyd.
